title: Induced current - speed of HxL loop exiting field

content.description: A rectangular loop of resistance <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math> is partly in a region of uniform magnetic field, as shown in the figure. The loop’s height and length are <math alttext="H" overflow="scroll"><mi>H</mi></math> and <math alttext="L" overflow="scroll"><mi>L</mi></math>, respectively. The magnetic field <math alttext="vector B" overflow="scroll"><mover accent="true"><mi>B</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></math> is directed out of the page. A constant force <math alttext="F sub 0" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>F</mi> <mn>0</mn> </msub> </math> is exerted on the loop to the right as shown, such that the loop moves with constant speed <math alttext="v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>v</mi></mstyle></math>.
content.question: Which expression is equal to <math alttext="v" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mi>v</mi> </mstyle> </math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator F sub 0, end sub, times R, and denominator B squared, times H squared, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>B</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator F sub 0, end sub, times R, and denominator B squared, times H L, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>B</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>H</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator F sub 0, and denominator B squared, times H squared, times R, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mrow><msup><mi>B</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator F sub 0, and denominator B squared, times H L R, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mrow><msup><mi>B</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>H</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator F sub 0, end sub, times R, and denominator B squared, times H squared, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>B</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
